DS_BW_adapt_diff_announcements_desc: Whenever adaptive difficulty level is updated, a chat message can notify of this change. It can notify either you and other players who also have DSBW installed, or everybody in the lobby.
DS_BW_starting_adapt_diff_desc: Adaptive difficulty will always be set to this value at the start of an assault, and will never be allowed to go below it.
DS_BW_always_hard_heists_desc: Forces all heists to be processed as "Hard", skipping the first easy wave during which enemies from lower difficulties recon the area.
DS_BW_tasks_per_min_mul_desc: Multiplies max amount of actions enemies can do per minute. Default amount is already increased by DSBW, and every new adaptive difficulty level increases it even further, making enemies overall faster than in vanilla. You can increase this amount even more, but note that this may significantly affect your frame rate.
DS_BW_player_info_desc: Everything related to other players in your lobby. NOTE: if you are running 'Death Wish +' mod, settings from that mod will take priority.
DS_BW_skills_showcase_desc: Print in chat perk deck, perk deck completion, and skill points info for each player in your session. Skill points can either be summed up, or distributed across trees/sub-trees. Only you can see these messages. Works both as client and host.
DS_BW_hourinfo_desc: Print in chat player's PAYDAY 2 playtime if possible. Only you can see these messages. Works both as client and host.
DS_BW_infamy_desc: Player playtime chat message will include player's infamy level. Does not work if player playtime is disabled.
DS_BW_endstat_header_desc: Settings for the scoreboard that appears after heist is completed. (Available only if you are the host) NOTE: if you are running 'Death Wish +' mod, settings from that mod will take priority.
DS_BW_endstattoggle_desc: Kill/death ratio of all players will be printed in chat after heist is completed. (Available only if you are the host)
DS_BW_statsmsgpublic_desc: Scoreboard will be printed as a public message for all players in the lobby to see
DS_BW_endstatSPkills_desc: Adds player's special kill count to the scoreboard.
DS_BW_endstatheadshots_desc: Adds player's headshot kill count to the scoreboard.
DS_BW_endstataccuarcy_desc: Adds player's accuracy stat to the scoreboard.
DS_BW_lobbyname_desc:
Automatically renames your lobby to 'Death Sentence, but Worse' if you are playing a contract on Death Sentence diffiuclty. This would let players on Crime.net screen know that you are running this mod.
Should only(!!!) be disabled if you run other lobby name changing mods.
DS_BW_patch_notes_desc: Click this button to open DSBW patch notes in the overlay browser.
